about.title: Pomodoro Technique
about.description: Pomodoro Technique is the time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo for improving productivity. The original technique consists of following steps:
about.stepThree: Work without distractions on the chosen task until time expires.
about.stepFive: After every four “pomodoros”, take a long break (15 minutes).
about.tip: If the original time intervals do not suite you, feel free to change time intervals by clicking “Settings”.
